replies.msg:
David Duke係美國老牌的納粹支持者兼美國白人以上主義者. 他的事跡仲被拍成電影《臥底天王》（Blackkklansman）, 套戲仲贏埋奧斯卡.

篇文係今年三月, 但既然係David Duke所講, 應該代表大部分美國納粹份子的立場.

美國老牌的納粹支持者兼美國白人以上主義者David Duke:
- 美國國務院係Deep State, 支持香港暴力示威.
- 我們一直視主播Tucker Carlson為手足, 請Tucker Carlson停止攻擊中國.

https://davidduke.com/wednesday200325/

Today Dr. Duke and Dr. Slattery called on Tucker Carlson to cease his scapegoating of China for America’s problems. He has always held up China as a bogeyman for his populist rhetoric because if he talks about Jewish power then he will lose his platform on Fox News. But now he is accusing China of killing Americans with the coronavirus and is calling for at a minimum a cold war against China. He agreed with Senator Josh Hawley when Hawley said that China should have to pay reparations to America for our economic losses.

Nobody knows where this virus came from, but we do know that our Deep State Department and intelligence services spent all of 2019 fomenting violent protests in Hongkong in order to destabilize China. Tucker has been a great voice for us over the past few years, and the last thing we need is for him to revert to join the bandwagon for a mother of all Neocon wars against China.

講述David Duke事跡的電影《臥底天王》（Blackkklansman）
